name: Gunship Heli Warfare Battle Game free
name_original: Gunship Heli Warfare Battle Game free
description:
Gunship Heli Warfare is a defense plan of your Frontline Border which is occupied by enemies and you are in a state of war. It is an ultimate Air warfare with fleets of enemies firing missiles at you. You have been given a mission to infiltrate into Terrorist’s camp. Turn your Heli towards Terrorist’s Base camp. You are fully equipped with Laser guided Missiles, Rocket Launchers and Machine Gun with infinite bullets. There will be different missions in which you will have to attack different enemy base camps by using your battle skills. These camps looks like Real 3D army camps in different attractive environments like Mountains, Desert, City and Sea. Accomplish your Mission objectives by destroying Fuel Tanks, Ammunition Depot, Army Vehicles, Anti Aircraft Guns, Helicopters and Jets. On destroying a target you will get cash and that cash will help you buying new helicopters, jet or ammunition.
How to Play:
- Select from a wide range of helicopters, each with unique characteristics.
- Use arrow keys and Tilt your device upward/downward to control the Heli
- Take Help from Navigation Radar to locate the Target
- Tap Fire/Missile/Rocket buttons to attack on Base camps
- Spend Earned Cash to Arm your chopper with a variety of weapons and equipment
- Challenge yourself with the next mission or replay a custom mission.
Features:
- Smooth and simple Heli control system
- Realistic 3D graphics with dynamic lightening and amazing explosion effects
- Good quality and Realistic sound effects
- Laser Guided Missiles
- Heli life bar and radar range sight
- Calibration Option
- A Variety of Helicopters
